input.sentences: after the marathon many of the runners stayed for pictures .
they were also very glad that the race was over .
they all felt proud that they finished the race .
output.sentences: Jawarah took pictures of the pink mob of runners.
Jasminz, the central protagonist of the pink mob of runners had a brilliant smile in her picture.
Jasminz was tired from running, but took one last pciture with the Al Bihad family, her soon to be in-laws.
Jolep, Jasminz's fiance, took a picture with his mom, Bial, who was glad she participated in the race.
Bial, proud she finished the race, received congratulations from her son, Jolep and her daughter, Amina.
